Fetches a list of OAuth providers available to the authenticated user.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<OauthProviderInfo[]>`
A promise that resolves to an array of OAuth provider information.
